pages.text: Wa Ma 'Arsalna Min Qablika 'Illa Rijalaan Nuhi 'Ilayhim Fas'alu 'Ahla Adh-Dhikri 'In Kuntum La Ta`lamuna
Bil-Bayyinati Wa Az-Zuburi Wa 'Anzalna 'Ilayka Adh-Dhikra Litubayyina Lilnnasi Ma Nuzzila 'Ilayhim Wa La`allahum Yatafakkaruna
Afa'amina Al-Ladhina Makaru As-Sayyi'ati 'An Yakhsifa Allahu Bihimu Al-'Arđa 'Aw Ya'tiyahumu Al-`Adhabu Min Haythu La Yash`uruna
Aw Ya'khudhahum Fi Taqallubihim Fama Hum Bimu`jizina
Aw Ya'khudhahum `Ala Takhawwufin Fa'inna Rabbakum Lara'ufun Rahimun
Awalam Yaraw 'Ila Ma Khalaqa Allahu Min Shay'in Yatafayya'u Zilaluhu `Ani Al-Yamini Wa Ash-Shama'ili Sujjadaan Lillahi Wa Hum Dakhiruna
Wa Lillahi Yasjudu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'Arđi Min Dabbatin Wa Al-Mala'ikatu Wa Hum La Yastakbiruna
Yakhafuna Rabbahum Min Fawqihim Wa Yaf`aluna Ma Yu'umaruna
Wa Qala Allahu La Tattakhidhu 'Ilahayni Athnayni 'Innama Huwa 'Ilahun Wahidun Fa'iyaya Farhabuni
Wa Lahu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Lahu Ad-Dinu Wa Asibaan 'Afaghayra Allahi Tattaquna
Wa Ma Bikum Min Ni`matin Famina Allahi Thumma 'Idha Massakumu Ađ-Đurru Fa'ilayhi Taj'aruna
Thumma 'Idha Kashafa Ađ-Đurra `Ankum 'Idha Fariqun Minkum Birabbihim Yushrikuna
